#summary How to start up

= Introduction =

As a developer you will need to install:

  * .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 SDK
  * SQL Server Compact and/or SQL Server Express 
    * the app is anyway intended to support _both_
    * SQL Server Management Studio Express could also come in handy
  * ZedGraph library (see project home page for link)
  * CsvReader (see project home page for link)

  * SharpDevelop IDE comes with integrated support for NUnit and TortoiseSVN
